name: World of LOL
description:
LOL is an online multiplayer game where the objective is to build the funniest sentence. At each round of the game, a hole card is selected by the judge.


The other players try to construct the funniest sentence.


Come and get the thrill of the punchlines with the many cards in the game!


Political correctness has no place in LOL !


Get a makeover! You have the right to make people laugh with style!
